title: Enchanting 'Pushpa Jhumka': Kundan, Emerald & Ruby Floral Drop Earrings
features: Floral motif with cluster of Rubies at the center surrounded by Kundan-set Polki Diamonds and Emeralds. Delicate Ruby droplets suspend from the flower, adding movement and charm. Features exquisite 'Kundan' setting, showcasing the traditional art of setting uncut diamonds in gold. The design blends traditional and modern elements, making it versatile for various occasions.
occasions: and traditional South Indian celebrations such as Muhurtham (ముహూర్తం)
or Half-Saree Function (లంగా వోని వేడుక). Also suitable for modern events and parties.
description: A captivating blend of traditional craftsmanship and contemporary design. The floral motif symbolizes prosperity and good fortune. The high-quality Kundan setting, combined with the brilliance of Emeralds and Rubies, creates a truly luxurious piece. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring lasting beauty and value.
